body: Perhaps people expected r_c to be more mournful over m_c's passing, however r_c couldn't help but feel a bitter sense of relief to be free from m_c.
Everyone knew that m_c and r_c had been going through a rough patch, but it's still a shock when r_c doesn't even attend the vigil.
r_c seems more intent on accepting the condolences of {PRONOUN/r_c.poss} Clanmates than remembering m_c's life.
r_c avoids m_c's vigil, saying the Clan needs {PRONOUN/r_c/object} more than m_c does now.

body: Even if {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} and m_c didn't see eye to eye at the end, r_c pulls it together enough to share a few anecdotes at the vigil.

body: m_c was never the perfect mate, but r_c can't help but feel a twinge of anxiety looking at {PRNOUN/m_c/poss} body. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/huddle/huddles} close as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/realize/realizes} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} future is no longer bonded.
